com.worxforus.net

Class NetResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.worxforus.Result
      • com.worxforus.net.NetResult

  • public class NetResult
extends Result
    This class contains the information and related details when making a network request using the NetHandler class
    Author:
    sbossen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String net_error
      If set: this contains the debug level information about the type of network error that occurred.
      java.lang.String net_error_type
      If set: this contains the name of the exception that caused a network error
      boolean net_reset_client_connection
      This is a flag used by the NetHandler class to determine if the client connection should be reset on the next access attempt.
      int net_response_code
      This contains the HTTP status code returned by the server
      org.apache.http.HttpEntity net_response_entity
      This contains the actual response from the server.
      java.lang.String net_response_message
      This string is human readable text of the response code by the server
      boolean net_success
      Tells you if the result of the network call was successful or not i.e.
      int num_attemps
      When set indicates how many times the system tried to retry the connection

    • Field Detail

      • net_success

        public boolean net_success
        Tells you if the result of the network call was successful or not i.e. could the server be reached

      • net_error

        public java.lang.String net_error
        If set: this contains the debug level information about the type of network error that occurred.

      • net_error_type

        public java.lang.String net_error_type
        If set: this contains the name of the exception that caused a network error

      • net_response_code

        public int net_response_code
        This contains the HTTP status code returned by the server

      • net_response_message

        public java.lang.String net_response_message
        This string is human readable text of the response code by the server

      • net_reset_client_connection

        public boolean net_reset_client_connection
        This is a flag used by the NetHandler class to determine if the client connection should be reset on the next access attempt. This is useful to do on SocketTimeouts

      • net_response_entity

        public org.apache.http.HttpEntity net_response_entity
        This contains the actual response from the server. The most common use is to translate the webserver response into a string: String consume_str = Utils.removeUTF8BOM(EntityUtils.toString(net_result.net_response_entity, Utils.CHARSET)); or read JSON objects NetResult.handleGenericJsonResponseHelper(net_result, this.getClass().getName()); //the string here is passed for logging purposes only net_result.object will contain your JSON objects parsed for you

      • num_attemps

        public int num_attemps
        When set indicates how many times the system tried to retry the connection
